name: Source-Control
description:
This is designed to be a generic source-control solution.  It handles multiple different
repository types at once.

Currently, there are integrations for Visual Source Safe and StarTeam (only tested under win32).

It is designed to be easily extensible, with different source-control modules being loaded on demand.

There is some documentation, including how to create source-control modules.
install_details:
Unzip into   .vim/  or vimfiles/

Don't forget to run :helptags ~/vimfiles/doc

versions.release_notes:
General:
  Update file status when doing \ss
  Make sure status is updated (For starteam)
StarTeam:
 Auto-Update status when checking out an 'Unknown' file.
 Preserve file status
